decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The London Borough of Hounslow as the Local Planning Authority hereby certify that on 18/11/2005, the erection of a single storey front infill extension to the existing garage and the conversion of the garage into two habitable rooms with associated external alterations was lawful within the meaning of Section 191 and 192 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for the following reason:
The development falls within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 because the proposal accords to the criteria set out in Class A.
Informatives: 
The site lies on or is close to a former landfill site. Therefore it is advised that before the proposal is undertaken the Council's Land Quality Team (020 8583 5065) be contacted to ensure that the development does not give rise to any potential risk from landfill gas migration into the new living rooms.
description: Certficate of lawfulness for the erection of an extension to the existing garage and conversion of the garage into habitable rooms incorporating the installation of a new window to front elevation to house.
